                     int subchannel,
                     Channel channel,
                     byte[] data)
                       throws LacewingException
        Attempts to send a binary message to this peer
        Parameters:
        lc - the client to send on
        subchannel - the subchannel to send on
        channel - the channel to send on; the peer must be a member of this channel
        data - the data to send
        Throws:
        LacewingException - thrown if sending fails or is impossible
